lines.text: Oh Sam, honey, you're going to be sitting at the red table today.
Um Sam, that's not your table, sweety.
Sam, that's not your table either, dear.
Come here, Sam. I'll show you to your table.
Okay, kids, now that you're all in your seats,
I want you to color in the sheets in front of you by following the colors that go with the numbers.
If you're done coloring, make sure your name is on your paper and place it on the board.
Sam doesn't know how to color!
The colors on that one are kind of weird...
Nice work kids! Now gather around me for story time.
